message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its unique value proposition, I'm initially proposing a price of $2,300,000. I'm open to discussing this further, so feel free to share your thoughts.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,800,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.
Bob, thanks for your interest and counter-offer. I understand your budget considerations, but the value of this product is truly unique.  How about we meet halfway at $2,050,000?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. How about we meet at $1,600,000?
